ISSUE.TITLE: Media meta sizes has inconsistent data type
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: If a media object does not have any size metadata available, the response value is an empty array (`[]`). If it does have values, then the response value is a dictionary (`{ thumbnail: { ... }, ... }`). For the empty case it should probably instead return an empty dictionary to simplify the deserialization logic for clients.
